title: Zhege Nianji Huan Neng Dang Daxia Ma

alternative_titles.ja: 这个年纪还能当大侠吗

synopsis:
After the Lao Bai left the big city, he returned to his hometown Chang'an with Yanzi (Yanshan Xue) to live. While working hard to run a Chang'an supermarket for their former heroic dreams, they met community neighbors: A Meng, A Hun, Long Zi, Xiao Man, Long Shu, You You, and Xiao Wu.

(Source: Bilibili)
